alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 18 at 8:27PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the following county, Riverside. * WHEN...Until 215 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of washes and creeks occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 824 PM PDT, Local law enforcement reported State Route 177 is closed between Interstate 10 and State Route 62 due to significant flooding from earlier thunderstorms, which produced very heavy rainfall. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen based on doppler radar estimates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
